data.comment: The first half has been concluded at Gelredome.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Arnhem.
Oussama Darfalou is replacing Sondre Tronstad for the home team.
Roel Janssen (Sittard) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 69, Lisandro Semedo is on a sub for Sebastian Polter for Sittard.
Sjors Ultee (Sittard) is making a second substitution, with Jaroslaw Jach replacing Roel Janssen.
Oussama Darfalou heads in to make it 1-0 at Gelredome.
In the minute 72, Great play from Oussama Tannane to set up the goal.
The home team replace Lois Openda with Thomas Bruns.
Jaroslaw Jach (Sittard) has received a yellow card from Jochem Kamphuis.
In the minute 83, Great finish from Armando Broja to give Vitesse a 2-0 lead.
That's a fine assist from Oussama Tannane.
Sjors Ultee is making the team's third substitution at Gelredome with Samuel Moutoussamy replacing Jorrit Smeets.
In the minute 86, Vitesse make their third substitution with Thomas Buitink replacing Armando Broja.
Oussama Tannane (Vitesse) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Patrick Vroegh.
The match is over. Final score 2-0.
Ben Rienstra (Sittard) has received a first yellow card.
